participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jake has a passion for storytelling and enjoys expressing himself through writing. He's a bit messy but has a kind heart.
participant_1.background: I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul. I don't wash my clothes as often as I should. I've started to write short stories in my spare time. I shop several times a week. I think my pets are the best things in my life.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is laid-back and passionate about music. He has a fun and creative side, spending his time on hobbies that let him express himself.
participant_2.background: I'm renting an apartment with my band mates. I am a youtuber. I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them. My birthday is in June. I am proud of my ability to play the bass and make music that connects with people.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just hanging out.
What do you do for fun?
I play the bass in a band and make YouTube videos.
That's awesome! What kind of videos do you make?
I make videos about music and how to play bass.
That's really cool! I love music. Do you have a favorite band?
I like a lot of bands, but my favorite is probably the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
They're a great band! I've seen them live a few times.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to see them live.
You should! They put on a great show.
I'll definitely try to see them next time they come to town.
Good! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and watch movies.
I like video games too! What's your favorite game?
I like a lot of games, but my favorite is probably The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I've played it a few times.
It's so much fun! I've spent hours exploring the world.
I know what you mean! It's a huge and beautiful world.
It is! I love how much there is to do.
Me too! I'm glad you like it.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it too.
